dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, absolutely nothing noteworthy happening with the weather in Astana today, then? Perfect blue skies, I assume.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, absolutely nothing noteworthy happening with the weather in Astana today, then? Perfect blue skies, I assume.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents and visitors in Astana have been warned of an approaching dust storm, reports Tengrinews.kz, citing the city's Department of Emergency Situations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Um, no, actually, quite the opposite.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Um, no, actually, quite the opposite.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What, a surprise sprinkle?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What, a surprise sprinkle?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, I mean, they've issued, like, a major dust storm warning for today.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I mean, they've issued, like, a major dust storm warning for today.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents and visitors in Astana have been warned of an approaching dust storm... A storm warning has been issued for April 10 in the capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A dust storm. Big deal. Isn't that just, uh, a regular Tuesday there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A dust storm. Big deal. Isn't that just, uh, a regular Tuesday there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, no, the city's Department of Emergency Situations issued the warning, citing Tengrinews.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, no, the city's Department of Emergency Situations issued the warning, citing the website.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents and visitors in Astana have been warned of an approaching dust storm, reports Tengrinews.kz, citing the city's Department of Emergency Situations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Emergency Situations? For, like, a bit of wind and dirt? Seems a littleâ€¦ overblown.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Emergency Situations? For, like, a bit of wind and dirt? Seems a little... overblown.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a full storm warning, though. Kazhydromet confirmed it too. For April tenth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a full storm warning, though. Kazhydromet confirmed it too. For April tenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A storm warning has been issued for April 10 in the capital. "According to Kazhydromet, a dust storm is expected in Astana on April 10," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kazhydromet. Right. So, officially, dust is happening. Got it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazhydromet. Right. So, officially, dust is happening. Got it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's, um, important to know, right? For residents, for visitors?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's, um, important to know, right? For residents, for visitors?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents and visitors in Astana have been warned of an approaching dust storm...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sure, I guess. Don't go outside if you don't wanna get dusty. Thrilling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sure, I guess. Don't go outside if you don't wanna get dusty. Thrilling.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But earlier, they also warned about heavy rains and frost in other parts of Kazakhstan. It's, like, a whole system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But earlier, they also warned about heavy rains and frost in other parts of Kazakhstan. It's, like, a whole system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, forecasters had also issued warnings about heavy rains and frost expected in various parts of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Rains, frost, now dust. It's almost like, you know, weather happens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rains, frost, now dust. It's almost like, you know, weather happens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but warnings. They matter. People need to be, uh, prepared.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but warnings. They matter. People need to be, uh, prepared.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Prepared for, what, the sky being outside? My point exactly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Prepared for, what, the sky being outside? My point exactly.

dialogue_turns.text: I just think, like, a heads-up about a dust storm isn't nothing.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah. Okay. Dust. We're on it.
